name: @org-quicko/strapi-plugin-converter
description: A Strapi plugin that converts API responses into a standardized response format. This plugin automatically transforms Strapi's default API response structure to create a flattened data format.
author: Quicko <developer@quicko.org.in>

strapi.name: org-quicko-strapi-plugin-converter
strapi.description: A Strapi plugin that converts API responses into a standardized response format. This plugin automatically transforms Strapi's default API response structure to create a flattened data format.
